metadata.title: CVE-2023-39328 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenJPEG similar to CVE-2019-6988. This flawallows an attacker to bypass existing protections and cause an applicationcrash through a maliciously crafted file.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-09-16').
insighttoolkit4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
ghostscript package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
